ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Symphonic Saber
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah now the mob is smiling while he beats on ya.  Great graphic for a high level weapon huh?  I haven t heard of anyone being able to tell the saber was doing
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah now the mob is smiling while he beats on ya. Great graphic for a high
level weapon huh? I haven't heard of anyone being able to tell the saber
was doing anything when it procs.

Kit

does anyone who has one of these notice a bit of difference after it procs?
it seems to be difficult if not impossible to test. i get beat on, it procs
(mob looks peaceful), i get beat on some more hehe. ah well, it's the only
kunark weapon i've got and i like it anyway.

Shada Powa, L54 Wood Elf Minstrel
